entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
